body.paragraph:
A for loop can be used to go through a sequence of elements one-by-one. 

 Notice the usage of "animal", this is the variable that holds the current value of our item.
A for loop can also be used together with the range() function call to go through a sequence of numbers.

tooltip.title: Run Indented Code a Specific Number of Times
tooltip.body: Creates an iterator variable from a sequence to repeatedly execute the indented code below the for loop.
